vclaim: Actor and comedian Ellie Kemper was crowned 1999 Queen of Love and Beauty at the "Veiled Prophet Ball" in St. Louis, Missouri. The ball is affiliated with an organization that has a racist history, including ties to the Ku Klux Klan (KKK).
title: Fact Check: Ellie Kemper, the KKK, and the ‘Veiled Prophet Ball’
subtitle: The actor’s ties to a controversial St. Louis debutante ball were unearthed in a 1999 photograph.
author: Nur Ibrahim
